text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Thank you !! Sir, This Hard times, We are watching you Father of India, We Believe 100% Indians will break the Covid-19 chain under your Leadership. Worried about Farmers, Unorganized Sector & What is the Impact on manufacturing and services sectors after lock down ? please guide
